::KitKat::

She looked from Megatron, to Apocalypse. She didn't hear the 
question, only heard him say something and felt like she had to 
repsond to him." AH, that's fine. What ever you decide is best."

She looked at Megatron. "Now, what is it that you need?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Apocalypse looked at her as the comm came in. He stood up his 12 
ft robot 
> mode must have been a little intimasating. He looked at her. "Do 
you wish me 
> you of the wekling drill bit. He will only cause you harm."
